“Live Oak Bank made the SBA loan process efficient and understandable. I knew where I was every step of the way. The M&A lending team guided me through the process with full transparency and were extremely knowledgeable about what was needed to get the loan funded.” - Andy Rougeot, Rogue Mountain, LLC | Denver, CO

Our dedicated mergers and acquisitions lending team has extensive Small Business Administration (SBA) expertise. At Live Oak Bank, we understand and embrace the search fund model, and we regularly assist searchers in structuring deals so that they are SBA-eligible, and able to enjoy our 10-year term and 10% equity injection minimum.
Live Oak Bank has provided over $2 Billion in SBA acquisition financing.

BIG SKY INVESTMENT STRATEGYBig Sky Investor Group specializes in purchasing under-performing websites, Software, SaaS or other businesses in niche markets - with rabid fans. Founded in March 2010, Century Hearing Aids sells top quality affordable hearing aids to people with hearing loss. We entered this market because we saw this as a huge market, 30-36 million people with hearing loss, with a huge problem: audiologists charging thousands and thousands of dollars for hearing aids--some companies charging $6000--$8000 a pair. We did not see how people could afford to spend thousands of dollars on hearing aids so we are building a business that provides tremendous savings to budget-conscious customers.  So here is our goal: We are trying to build a company we’d like to do business with ourselves. Our goal is to create outstanding customer experiences, and be a company that’s personable, respectful, transparent, honest and helpful. Here are some specific goals with customers service: Offer you the best hearing aids at affordable prices Treat every customer as if they were a member of our own family To tell the truth. If we do not have a hearing aid that fits your hearing loss. We will tell you.Deliver your hearing aids within 5-7 business days--FREEIf you return your hearing aids, to issue 100% refund within 7 days of receiptTo provide the best customer service possible--if we screwed up--we will do everything in our power to make it right - we know the customers is not always right, but whether they are or not it is our job to make them feel that way.  Find and Keep customers and clients better than any of our competitors. Analyze our customers needs and offer better solutions than anyone else can. Make nice with my competitors - you never know when you could work together.Master the integrated media marketplace.Build relationships with agents, vendors, suppliers and colleaguesAlways Act in ways to build on the brand nameTo welcome change - throw out rules and adapt to the market - the only eternal rule is to keep your ear to the ground and your antennae up at all times.

Intuit Inc. is a leading provider of business and financial management solutions for small and mid-sized businesses; financial institutions, including banks and credit unions; consumers and accounting professionals. Its flagship products and services, including QuickBooks®, QuickBooks® POS, Quicken® and TurboTax® software, simplify small business management and payroll processing, personal finance, and tax preparation and filing.
Co-Founder and VP of Sales & Marketing

Founded in 2000, Turbo Squid is dedicated to the management and distribution of digital products and other relevant content for 3D and 2D designers and creative professionals. Turbo Squid provides a global market for digital products by enabling individual and corporate users to list, promote and sell their content to users around the world.
Northern Arizona University has a student population of about 20,000 at its main campus in Flagstaff and at over 35 sites across the state of Arizona.

January 20, 2012, Jon worked with Hart but at different companies

Hart has to be one of the smartest guys in the room.   Harts ability to decipher a customer problem into a money making opportunity, or in turn pass on the idea,  is nothing less than impressive.   Case in point,  I have probably approached Hart with 4-5 ideas over the years and Hart has always recognized areas of the opportunity that I missed which would surely be a money losing business.   Harts ability to see the big picture just scratches the surface or his abilities...because ideas are a dime a dozen...what Hart does best is execute the idea.  If its a worthy idea, Hart gets it done.  From planing to management to finished product...Hart is an entrepreneur.  He is an idea guy with the ability to deliver a finished product, on time, on budget and make money.

summary: WHAT I DO:  I help Small to Medium Sized Business owners  find $10k to $50k extra cash flow in their business.   I would like to show you how to monetize and maximize the amount of income you make per customer and help you create methodical marketing systems that bring in loads of customers consistently month after month. I SEE BUSINESSES STRUGGLE WITH:► Costs continuing to eat up all the profits► Erratic business volume and not selling enough► Continuing to do what’s not working ► Trying to do it all by yourself DOES THIS SOUND LIKE YOUR BUSINESS?If it does,   YOUR BUSINESS CAN BE BETTER.    Give me 45 Minutes to show you how. HOW I DO IT:  My goal is to dig deep and find your company’s under-performing areas of business, through financial management, sales, marketing, goal-setting, and personal coaching skills, add new life and strategic vision to your struggling company, and help you hit your goals! DO YOU NEED HELP WITH YOUR BUSINESS?   If you are done with wasting time and money jumping from one shiny object to the next, if you know there is gap in your skills and tools and you are committed to doing what it takes to achieve the results you desire and deserve, if you are serious about reaching your full potential and breaking through as a business owner,   I want to encourage you to reach to me and set an appointment.   I think I can help.   WHAT OTHERS SAY:  "$1.7 Million to $2.3 Million in 8 months without spending any more money on marketing"  David Avgikos, DigimationWANT TO SEE HOW IT'S DONE?   Claim Your FREE Copy of this EBOOK:  8 Simple Strategies that are Proven Revenue Generators for any Business - There is a Proven Blueprint to finding $10k to $50k in your business, copy this link into a browser:  www.pigheadeddetermination.us  READY TO TALK?   Reach out to me directly here on Linkedin Messaging,  Or call me directly at:  520.488.6704,  Or email me at:  jstoddard7@cox.net
name: Jon Stoddard
